name: Chifend
description:
Defend off waves of enemies and protect your chicken house! Buy chicks to assist you in your battle!

This was made for LD41

Theme : Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

My choice of genres : RTS, Platformer

CONTROLS

A, D, Space

HOW THE GAME WORKS

Farming chicks : make money

Machine-gun and Rocket chicks : attack enemies

Earn money by using farming chicks or killing enemies
